definition: to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: If be inside affirmatory time nondelivery, consumer will win compensation of entire fund transportation expenses.
sentences.chinese: 如在承諾時間內沒有送達，消費者將獲全款運費賠償。

sentences.english: A written order to suspend or terminate execution shall become effective immediately after being served on the parties concerned.
sentences.chinese: 中止和終結執行的裁定，送達當事人後立即生效。

sentences.english: The cars arrived to the start point by train and the crew – by airplane.
sentences.chinese: 車輛由火車送達了起點，全體成員也乘飛機在此彙集。

sentences.english: Every day, they deliver the newspapers promptly to each household.
sentences.chinese: 他們每天都把報紙及時送達各家各戶。

sentences.english: The Van der Sloots were served with the suit while on a trip to New York.
sentences.chinese: 當他在紐約旅行時，斯沃特就被送達訴訟。

sentences.english: Served with fresh vegetables, sauté potatoes and gravy.
sentences.chinese: 送達新鮮蔬菜，炒土豆和肉汁。

sentences.english: The donations will be channelled to the quake zone through the Ministry of Civil Affairs and the Red Cross Society of China.
sentences.chinese: 全部款項將民政部和中國紅十字會送達地震災區。

sentences.english: Would you be able to get it there on time by a ground delivery?
sentences.chinese: 你們有沒有辦法用海陸運輸，將貨品準時送達？

sentences.english: Caviar has been considered a delicacy meant to be served with hors d' oeuvres .
sentences.chinese: 魚子醬已經被認爲是一個微妙意味著餐前須送達小食。

sentences.english: The more relevant the mail, the more likely it is to be delivered and opened.
sentences.chinese: 郵件相關度越高，其被送達和打開的可能性越高。

sentences.english: The non-delivery report does not contain sufficient information about the original message.
sentences.chinese: 非送達報告不能包括關於原始郵件的足夠信息。

sentences.english: When the parcel arrived, the book was in perfect condition and George was delighted.
sentences.chinese: 當包裹送達的時候，這本書完整無損，喬治十分高興。

sentences.english: if the person is a legal person or other organization, the written decision shall be delivered to its reception office for a signed receipt.
sentences.chinese: 受送達人是法人或者其他組織的，交其收發部門簽收。

sentences.english: The reasons for service by public announcement and the process gone through shall be recorded in the case files.
sentences.chinese: 公告送達，應當在案卷中記明原因和經過。

sentences.english: And our content sheds Shanghai to also can accomplish major order tertian service.
sentences.chinese: 而上海我們的物流也可以做到大部分訂單隔日送達。

sentences.english: The above-mentioned written order shall be served on both parties and the arbitral organ.
sentences.chinese: 裁定書應當送達雙方當事人和仲裁機構。

definition: to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
